menuItems.ingrediant_list: milk, meat, gluten, nuts, mozzarella, artichokes, peppers, prosciutto, olives, tomatoes, parmesan, basil, garlic, walnut, ciabatta
menuItems.description: Two balls of buffalo mozzarella, artichokes in olive oil, balsamic sundried peppers, slices of prosciutto, three tablespoons of mixed olives, a handful of cherry tomatoes, parmesan, handpicked leafs of fresh basil, garlic and one loaf of walnut ciabatta.

menuItems.ingrediant_list: poultry, milk, lactose, onion, carrot, tomato, black pepper, sugar
menuItems.description: With yellow onion, organic carrots from our garden, fresh tomatoes, heavy cream, freshly ground black pepper, brown sugar. Highest quality chicken broth basis.

menuItems.ingrediant_list: fruit, milk, lactose, feta, cucumber, watermelon, mint, basil
menuItems.description: Organic watermelon with sweet english cucumber, creamy feta cheese with mint and basil leaves from our garden.

menuItems.ingrediant_list: seafood, egg, red pepper, onion, shallot, celery, red pepper, dill, black pepper
menuItems.description: Meat from the imitation crab, minced shallot, housemade mayonnaise, minced celery, organic red pepper, fresh dill from our garden and freshly ground black pepper.

menuItems.ingrediant_list: gluten, bread, chickpeas, potato, red onion, coriander, min, cumin, chilli, ginger
menuItems.description: Indian street food with crisp rounds of bread filled with chickpeas, peeled potatoes and red onoins, deep-fried in rapeseed oil, drizzled with coriander, mint, cumin, chilli flakes and ginger.

menuItems.ingrediant_list: gluten, meat, cream, milk, lactose, egg
menuItems.description: Homemade full-grain spaghetti with the finest crunchy bacon. For our classic italian carbonara we use the finest cream and organic eggs from local cultivation only.
